LAWLESS ELEMENTS: 9061 CENTCOM (REGION VIII) SAMAR (STRAFING) Ref: 8ID, PA Report RN: 8D8-OPN-363-22-03-10 dtd 22 Mar 2010 On 211600 Mar 2010, MOL 20 unidentified members of a PAG armed with one (1) M60 GPMG and M16 rifles intentionally fired at the house of Ex-Brgy Chairman Silverio Casaljay and his son who is an identified leader of the LIberal Party in Brgy Gajo, Sta Margarita, Samar. Other Details: MOTIVE – PERSONNAL GRUDGE (RIDO).   7975 EASTMINCOM (ARMM) MAGUINDANAO  (ARMED CLASH) Ref: EASTMINCOM Report RN: EMCOC-0803-384-10 dtd 09 Mar 2010 On 09 Mar 2010, the group of Datu Mando Tambungalan and members of the inner guard, 106BC, MILF under Salipada Mipantao @ BOY DOS, @ IPAD and unidentified leader (believed to be the son of a certain @ ONSE) clashed at vicinity Sitio Pinag-Inuman (51N XH 5980768465), Brgy Kitango, Datu Piang, Maguindanao. Summary Report: On 010015 Mar 2010, COMBINED ELEMENTS OF 46TH IB AND SOTG UNDER ILT CADIL, 2LT SAPINDING AND 2LT BABANAG RESPECTIVELY WHILE CONDUCTING COMBAT PATROL ENCOUNTERED MORE OR LESS FORTY (40) PAGs UNDER UNKNOWN LEADER AT VICINITY 51N XH 627597 TIMBANGAN, SHARIFF AGUAK, MAGUINDANAO. THE ENCOUNTER LASTED FOR ALMOST TWENTY (20) MINUTES THE ENEMY WITHDREW TOWARDS NORTHEAST DIRECTION, TROOPS IMMEDIATELY SCOURED AND SEARCHED THE ENCOUNTER SITE.Other Details:
Other Details: PROGRESS REPORT ASOB
Action Taken: CO, 46TH IB TOGETHER WITH THE AVAILABLE TROOPS REINFORCED TO THE AREA AND FURTHER INFORMED THE ADJACENT UNITS IN SHARIFF AGUAK TO INCLUDE PNP FROM ANY EVENTUALITIES.

Summary Report: On 060005 Mar 2010, TROOPS OF 46TH IB BASED AT AMPATUAN WAREHOUSE AT POBLACION, SHARIFF AGUAK, MAG (51N XH 601588) UNDER 2LT RICHARD D KADIL, Bn S2 WERE HARASSED BY UNDETERMINED NUMBER OF ARMED LAWLESS GROUP (ALG) USING ASSORTED HPFAs. SAID TROOPS IMMEDIATELY RETURNED FIRE TO THE ENEMY POSITION.Other Details:
Other Details: NEGATIVE CASUALTY ON THE GOV’T SIDE WHILE UNDET ON THE ENEMY SIDE. FOR INFORMATION AND REFERENCE.
Action Taken: ONE (1) SECTION OF HHCVCo (1 OFFICER/13 EP) UNDER COL RAUL M CESTONA FA (GSC) PA WHILE ON SECURITY PATROL AT NEARBY VICINITY (51N XH 591592) POBLACION, SHARIFF AGUAK ARRIVED AT WAREHOUSE TO REINFORCE THE ENGAGED TROOPS AND DIRECTED FIRES FROM THE TWO (2) ARMORED VEHICLES USING CAL .50 MACHINE GUNS AND TWO (2) RDS FIRES OF 81MM MORTAR TOWARDS THE ENEMY LOCATION. AFTER 40 MINS OF SPORADIC FIRES, SAID ARMED LAWLESS GROUP WITHDREW TO NE DIRECTION.

Summary Report: RE HARASSMENT AT WAREHOUSE TEMPORARY PATROL BASE, POB SHARIFF AGUAK, MAG ON 060005H MAR 10.On 070600 Mar 2010, RE HARASSMENT TO THE COMPOSITE TROOPS OF 46TH IB & 1ST MIB (HHCo/BCo, 46TH IB/12MIC, 1ST MIB) UNDER 2LT RICHARD D KADIL (INF) PA AT WAREHOUSE TEMPORARY PATROL BASE, POBLACION SHARIFF AGUAK, MAGUINDANAO (51N XH 601588) WERE HARASSED BY UNDET NUMBER OF ALG CAME FROM TAPIKAN 1, SHARIFF AGUAK, MAG UNDER TL BOTO KRITICAL (TNU), TL DOUBLE ONE (TNU), TL RIKE ZOK (TNU) AND TL SOMBA (TNU) ALL OF 105TH BC, FIREFIGHT ENSUED AND LASTED FOR ABOUT 15 MINUTES.
Other Details: AMMO EXPENDITURES: 2 – RDS FOR 81MM MORTAR, 5 – RDS 40MM FOR GL, 177 – RDS CAL 5.56MM FOR (M16/K3), 100 RDS CAL .50 FROM CMDO V-150 AND 80 RDS CAL 7.62MM FROM SFV. FOR INFORMATION AND REFERENCE.
Action Taken: TROOPS UNDER 2LT KADIL (INF) PA CONDUCTED CLEARING OPERATION AT THE ENCOUNTER SITE AND RECOVERED ENEMY PERSONAL BELONGINGS AND RETURNED PROPER STATION AT ABOUT 0700H SAME DAY WITH NEGATIVE ENEMY CONTACT.

Summary Report: On 142125 Mar 2010, UNDETERMINED NUMBER OF LAWLESS ELEMENTS UNDER UNKNOWN LEADER HARASSED PNP PERSONNEL THAT GUARDED THE AMPATUAN WAREHOUSE AT POBLACION, SHARIFF AGUAK, MAGUINDANAO (51N XH 601588). THE PNP RETURNED FIRE TOWARDS THE ENEMY POSITION. AFTERWHICH, THE ENEMY WITHDREW TO DIFFERENT DIRECTION.Other Details:
Other Details: TWO (2) WIA ON PNP SIDE WHILE UNDETERMINED CASUALTY ON THE ENEMY SIDE. PROGRESS REPORT TO FOLLOW.

Summary Report: On 132125 Mar 2010, RE HARASSMENT AT POBLACION, SHARIFF AGUAK, MAG (51NXH 601 588). Summary Report: On 210930 Mar 2010, AN UNIDENTFIED PERSON DRIVING A MAROON TOWN ACE WITH PLATE NUMBER MVT 820 FROM IGINAGAMPONG, DATU UNSAY, MAGU STOPPED AT PHOENIX GASOLINE STATION, POBLACION, AMPATUAN, MAGUINDANAO (51NXH 607 557) AND DELIVERED A BOX, INTENDED FOR MR SAMMY MABANG, CASHIER OF PHENIX GASOLINE STATION. SAID PACKEGED ALLEGEDLY CAME FROM JOHAIBER BASILAN. AFTER WHICH THE DRIVER IMMEDIATELY LEFT THE AREA. BEING DOUBTLY OF THE CONTENT OF THE PACKEGE, SAID CASHIER, THREW IT ALONG THE HIGHWAY & IMMEDIATELY REPORTED INFORMED C/46TH IB/8TH ID.Other Details:
Other Details: FOR INFORMATION AND REFERENCE
Action Taken: HASTILY, TROOPS OF C/46TH IB/8TH ID LED BY ILT HUMIWAT (INF) PA TOGETHER WITH PNP PERSONNEL UNDER P/INS NELVEN TUAN RUFON PNP RESPONDED. AT ABOUT 1030H SAME DAY, 6TH EOD TEAM UNDER CPT FRANCIS SEÑORON (OS) ARRIVED IN THE AREA & CONDUCTED WATER DISRUPTION TO DISABLE THE IED. SAID UNIT WAS ABLE TO RECOVER MECHANISMS OF AN IED THAT ARE AS FOLLOWS: ONE (1) UNIT CELLULAR PHONE & EXPLOSIVE WIRES; TYPE OF EXPLOSIVE USED WAS NOT DETERMINED BY THE 6TH EOD. RECOVERED MATERIALS WERE BROUGHT BY THE 6TH EOD TEAM FOR PROPER DISPOSITION AND DISPOSAL.

Summary Report: On 272330 Mar 2010, THE HOUSE OF A CTN TENG EBUS AT VIC 51N XH 588598 BRGY SATAN, DATU UNSAY, MAGUINDANAO WAS STRAFED BY MOL TWENTY (20) ARMED MEN BELIEVED TO BE ELEMENTS OF 105TH  BC, BIAF, MILF UNDER UNKNOWN LEADER. INFORMATION DISCLOSED THAT THE MOTIVE OF THE ARMED GROUP IS TO TAKE THE CAA’S FIREARM.Other Details:
Other Details: PROGRESS REPORT TO FOLLOW
Action Taken: INTEL OPERATIVE 28IB COORDINATED WITH THE OWNER OF THE HOUSE TO TRACK DOWN THE PERPETRATOR.

Summary Report: On 272330 Mar 2010, AN IMPROVISED EXPLOSIVE DEVICE WAS RECOVERED BY 6TH EODD UNDER CPT FRANCIS A SENORON (OS) PA AT  POB SHARIFF AGUAK, MAG (51NXH 60 59). PRIOR TO THE RECOVERY, CO OF 12TH MECHANIZED COMPANY/LAD REQUESTED ASSISTANCE OF EOD DETACHMENT, EOD BN, ASCOM, PA AT PC HILL COTABATO CITY TO VERIFY & CHECK A REPORTED IED IN FRONT OF THE RESIDENTIAL HOUSE OF MR THEING BROTEM IN SAID PLACE. THE TEAM LED BY CPT FRANCIS A SENORON IMMEDIATELY RESPONDED & CONDUCTED DISRUPTION OPERATION IN THE AREA & SUCCESSFUL RECOVERED THE FOLLOWING IED COMPONENTS:A.9 VOLT BATTERY (EVEREADY) COLORED BLACK;
Enemy Side: Killed  Sadam Denga Dansalan    Muhaimen  Magandigan Dansalan    Sadam Denga Dansalan    Muhaimen  Magandigan Dansalan
Government Side: KIA PO1 Dennis Sorupia    WIA PO1 Mojamin Mohamad    Other Details: One (1) KIA and one (1) WIA on the PNP personnel while undetermined number of casualty on the enemy side. Action Taken: Troops from 45IB and 12MIC reinforced the PNP. 8949 EASTMINCOM (ARMM) MAGUINDANAO (SURRENDER) Ref: 6ID, PA Report RN: 6DTOC-1403-32-10 dtd 15 Mar 2010 On 14 Mar 2010, one (1) squad from ACoy, 6IB, 6ID under 1LT TUNGA-EN PA effected the surrender of Virgilio Fernandez Sumatra, 42 yrs old, married and resident of Lower Baylon Kitol, Brgy Kuya, South Upi, Maguindanao at vicinity Sitio Timanan (51N XH 2561), Brgy Romongaob, South Upi, Maguindanao. Enemy Side: Surrendered  Virgilio Fernandez  Sumatra   Other Details: Sumatra was involved in cattle rustling in the area and admitted to have worked with a certain Toka/Tuko/Scientist, leader of an armed lawless group operating in the area. Accordingly, he decided to surrender to ACoy, 6IB when he was ambushed by the group of Scientist  last 09 Mar 10 and threatended his family. Action Taken: Sumatra was accompanied by 1LT TUNGAYA-EN PA to the South Upi PNP Station for blotter purposes and he is now temporary detained at ACoy CP at Sitio Magno, Brgy Romongaob of the same municipality. 8958 EASTMINCOM (ARMM) MAGUINDANAO (ENCOUNTER ) Ref: 6ID, PA Report RN: 6DTOC-1503-36-2010 dtd 15 Mar 2010 Progress Report to Journal Item Nr: 8944 dtd 14 Mar 2010, re encounter (not harassment as previously reported) by PNP troops against undetermined number of LEs at vicinity Ampatuan Warehouse at Poblacion, Shariff Aguak, Maguindanao on 131225 Mar 2010 . Government Side: KIA PO1 Dennis  Sorupia    WIA PO1 Mojamin Mohamad    Other Details: Accordingly, security troops of 1568th PPMG under PINSP AGPALZA PNP and PINSP LAGTO PNP engaged the enemy in a 45 minute firefight.  The enemy withdrew towards Northeast.   Action Taken: a.  Combined elements of Scout Pltn, 45IB, backed-up by two (2) AVs of 12MECH, 1MECH reinforced the engaged PNP troops. b.  BCoy, 45IB was directed to conduct blocking operations along Brgy Kuloy of said municipality. 8972 EASTMINCOM (ARMM) MAGUINDANAO  (MASS EVACUATION) Ref: 6ID, PA Report RN: 6DTOC-1703-40-10 dtd 17 Mar 2010 On 16 Mar 2010, more or less 100 residents of Sitios Marander and Renede, Brgy Bungo, South Upi, Maguindanao evacuated to Brgy Looy of said municipality for fear of their lives due to the presence of unidentified armed lawless group in the area.  Action Taken: a.  Troops of ACoy, 6IB led by 1LT CAPUYAN (INF) PA proceeded to the area to conduct clearing operations and to restore the peace and order. b.  troops of CAA Detachment at Brgy Looy of said municipality led by Sgt Digdigan (Inf) PA proceeded to the evacuation site to provide assistance and security. 8984 EASTMINCOM (ARMM) MAGUINDANAO  (CATTLE RUSTLING) Ref: EASTMINCOM Report RN: EMCOC-1703-432-10 dtd 17 Mar 2010 On 162000 Mar 2010, more or less 10 fully armed, believed to cattle rustlers, stole five (5) carabaos and two (2) horses from the residents of Sitio Bisaya (51N XH 3857), Brgy Pandan, South Upi, Maguindanao.  A certain Toto Moboayaen, one (1) of the owners, was shot on the finger.  Responding troops of Pandan Detachment, 18th Mag CAAC, 38IB led by Cpl Ramos (Inf) PA conducted blocking operations along the enemy suspected escape route (Northeast), and subsequently chanced upon the group and firefight lasted for about 30 minutes.  Afterwhich the enemy withdrew towards unknown direction.  No casualty was reported on either side, but three (3) carabaos and one (1) horse were recovered. Other Details: Accordingly the encounter inflicted casualty to the group as evidenced of the blood stains at the scene. 8993 EASTMINCOM (CARAGA) MAGUINDANAO (BURNING) Ref: 6ID, PA Report RN: DTOC-1803-49-10 dtd 18 Mar 2010 On 172100 Mar 2010, four (4) houses at vicinity Brgy Maitumaig, Datu Unsay, Maguindanao were burned by an unidentified armed group, believed to be lawless elements. Other Details: A burst of gun fire was heard by personnel of 29IB, 6ID, PA, 200 mtrs west from their detachment located at Brgy Maitumaig of the same municipality. Action Taken: Personnel of said detachment were alerted and established observation post near the vicinity to preempt further atrocities. 9017 EASTMINCOM (ARMM) MAGUINDANAO (CATTLE RUSTLING) Ref: 6ID, PA Report RN: 6DTOC-1903-53-2010 dtd 19 Mar 2010 On 191000 Mar 2010, more or les four (4) bonnet-wearing armed men, believed to be cattle rustlers stole the carabao of a certain Simpal Ismael at Brgy Labu-Labu II, Datu Hoffer, Maguindanao.  Likewise, the presence of the armed group in the area created panic to the residents living along the river banks (Limuray river). Action Taken: Combined elements of CCoy, 45IB led by 1LT LOUIE MALE (INF) PA, CAA Coy, 38IB and Datu Hoffer MPS led by PO2 Hermenegildo C Lu Jr proceeded to the area, but failed to arrest the suspects. 9045 EASTMINCOM (ARMM) MAGUINDANAO  (RECOVERY OF IED) Ref: 6ID, PA Report RN: 6DTOC-2103-57-10 dtd 21 Mar 2010 On 211030 Mar 2010, acting on the reported presence of Improvised Explosive Device (IED), troops of 6EODT under CPT SENONON (OS) PA recovered and subsequently disrupted one (1) IED at vicinity Poblacion, Ampatuan, Maguindanao. Other Details: a.  Initial investigation disclosed that at 0930H of same date, an unidentified suspect onboard a Town Ace Vehicle (PN: MVT 820) stopped at Pheonix Gasoline Station at said place and handed to Samy Mabang, the cashier, a box from a certain Johaiber Basilan. Afterwhich, the suspect  hurriedly flee from the area onboard the aforementioned vehicle. b.  Mabang, threw the suspicious box along the Highway and subsequently reported the incident to nearby troops of CCoy, 46IB.   Action Taken: Troops of 46IB under 1LT HUMIWAT (INF) PA together with PNP personnel immediately responded to the area while 2LT KADIL (INF) PA, Bn S2, left MCP/H46IB and proceeded to Pob Ampatuan to confirm the reported suspicious looking box. 9145 EASTMINCOM (REGION XII) SOUTH COTABATO  (HARASSMENT) Ref: EASTMINCOM Report RN: EMCOC-2703-504-10 dtd 27 Mar 2010 On 24 Mar 2010, unidentified suspects harassed the house of a certain Ali Kalid Y Miskinan at Purok Kalamunding, Brgy Bentung, Polomolok, South Cotabatao. The victim is a former member of MILF and presently employed as security guard of Dolfil-Stanfilo.
Civilian Side: Injured   Abunam Kalid   Soraina Kalid   Fhyrodz Abubacar Other Details: a.  Initial investigation disclosed that the two (2) successive explosions followed by gun fires of undetermined caliber was heard at the residence of Mr Ali Kalid Y Miskinan. b.  Motive of the incident was believed to be personal grudge. Action Taken: The victims were immediately rushed by their relatives to Polomolok municipal hospital  for medical treatment. 9167 EASTMINCOM (ARMM) MAGUINDANAO  (RECOVERY OF IED) Ref: 6ID, PA Report RN: 6DTOC-2803-74-10 dtd 28 Mar 2010 On 271928 Mar 2010, acting to the reported presence of Improvised Explosive Device (IED), elements of 6th EODD under CPT SENORON (SC) PA recovered and disrupted one (1) IED at vicinity Poblacion, Shariff Aguak, Maguindanao. Other Details: a.  Prior to the recovery, CO 12th Mechanize Coy, LAD requested the assistance of said unit inorder to verify the reported presence of IED located infront of the house of a certain Theing Brotem. b.  The IED was composed of 81mm mortar projectile, one (1) 9v battery, one (1) improvised electric blasting cap and one (1) NOKIA cellular phone as triggering device. 9181 EASTMINCOM (REGION XI) DAVAO CITY (GRENADE THROWING) Ref: EASTMINCOM Report RN: EMCOC-2903-529-10 dtd 29 Mar 2010 On 281300 Mar 2010, unidentified suspects lobbed a grenade at the vicinity of 103DRC billeting area at Brgy Hall, Brgy 76-A, Davao City.  However, said grenade did not explode. Other Details: a.  Accordingly, Brgy Tanod Manuel Abellana Sr noticed an object bounced on the car`s hood, adjacent to the gate of the Brgy Hall and was later found out to be one (1) unexploded fragmentation grenade. b.  The motive of the incident is yet to be determined. Action Taken: The grenade was recovered by responding EODT led by SSg Quimson PA upon the request of 2LT PACAÑA PA of TF Davao.  The grenade was brought to HQ TF Davao for safekeeping. 4846 WESTMINCOM (ARMM) LANAO DEL SUR (RESCUE OPERATIONS) Ref: EASTMINCOM Report RN: EMCOC-1403-418-10 dtd 14 Mar 2010 On 14 Mar 2010, combined elements headed by COL REY C ARDO (JSC) GSC PA, 103Bde Commander with OPCON units: 33IB, 15IB, 65IB, 12LAC and 1501 PMG under P/SUPT GANI P ASIRA (DCS), Group Director rescued five (5) hostage victims at Poblacion, Kapai, Lanao del Sur, who are all employees of VICMAR logging concession.  The rescued victims are: Civilian Side: Rescued Mr Eudillo Padilla Mr Rene Morteza Mr Felipe Lanuza Mrs Vicky Lanuza Mr Jerald Cabanig Other Details: a.  The victims were abducted at vicinity Sitio Champion, Panoruganan, Kapai, Lanao del Sur and were brougth to several places until they were rescued at Poblacion, Kapai, Lanao del Sur.  There were eight (8) abductors and the leader was identified as Basil Kauyag. b.  The rescue operations was made thru the joint efforts of Hon Mayor of Tagoloan II, Lanao del Sur and other local government official, PNP and 103Bde and its OPCON units. Action Taken: The victims are placed under the custody of 103Bde for custodial debriefing. 7882 WESTMINCOM (ARMM) BASILAN (RECOVERY OF IED) Ref: 1ID, PA Report RN: IDC-2801-435-2010 dtd 28 Feb 2010 On 281400 Feb 2010, troops of 4SRC (OPCON to 32IB) with elements of 3EODBn led by TSg Felix Jumawan (OS) PA recovered two (2) Improvised Explosive Devices (IEDs) laid at vicinity Brgy Kaum Pamatsaken, Sumisip, Basilan. Other Details: Said IEDs consists of one (1) RPG projectile, TNT and have 1 inch concrete nails as shrapnels. Action Taken: Said IEDs were brought to CP BCoy, 32IB for safekeeping. 7899 WESTMINCOM (ARMM) BASILAN (HARASSMENT) Ref: 1ID, PA Report RN: 1DC-0103-440-10 dtd 02 Mar 2010 On 010530 Mar 2010, Command Post of BCoy, 32IB located at Brgy Kaum Pamatsakim, Sumisip, Basilan was straffed by undet number of LEs under unknown leader using 40MM GL. Firefight lasted for about 10 minutes afterwhich, the enemy withdrew towards Northeast. No casualty was reported on either sides. Action Taken: Personnel of said CP established defensive position and returned fire towards enemy position. 7902 WESTMINCOM (ARMM) BASILAN (LAND MINING) Ref: WESTMINCOM Report RN: WMC-0203-02 dtd 02 Mar 2010 On 02 Mar 2010, operating troops of 4SRC, 2SRB, SOCOM, PA were landmined while conducting combat patrol at vicinity Brgy Pamatsaken (GC 889160), Sumisip, Basilan Province. Summary Report: On 271700 Mar 2010, TWO (2) UNIDENTIFIED SUSPECT BELIEVED TO BE CTs SHOT TO DEATH A CERTAIN DANILO ABAJA AT  PUROK 7, BRGY SALVACION, MAWAB, CVP (51N ZJ 166 301). DANILO ABAJA IS A RETIRED PHILIPPINE ARMY SOLDIER.ACCORDING TO THE REPORT, WHILE THE VICTIM WAS WALKING WITH HIS WIFE THE ASSAILANTS WHO WERE HIDING IN A NEARBY BAMBOO TREE SHOT HIM TO DEATH. HE TRIED TO ESCAPE ON THE INITIAL PHASE OF THE ASSASSINATION BUT WAS EVENTUALLY CORNERED. THE VICTIM SUFFERED GUNSHOT WOUND IN HIS HEAD WHICH CAUSED HIS UNTIMELY DEMISE.
Other Details: REMAINS OF DANILO ABAJA LIES IN STATE AT LANDA FUNERAL HOMES, MAWAB, CVP. FOR INFORMATION.
Action Taken: TROOPS OF 10SFID, 3SFBn PROCEEDED TO THE CRIME SCENE TO PURSUE OR APPREHEND THE SUSPECT.

The troops engaged the armed men, believed to be CTs, in a brief firefight.  No casualty was reported on either side.   Enemy Side:  Apprehended  Arnel Tulabing   Other Details: a.  Accordingly, the troops were on their way back to Coy CP from marketing at Kidapawan City of same province when the incident happened, which is about 350 meters away from the said CP. b.  The 15 yr old suspect was apprehended by the pursuing troops of 62DRC fleeing from the blast site. c.  Post blast investigation disclosed that the explosion created a crater of 1.6 ft in diameter & 10 inches deep.  Recovered at the site were 100 meters stranded wire (# 18), fragments (cut nails # 4) and piece of PVC pipe.  Further disclosed that trinitrotoluene (TNT), a substance commonly used by CTs in making IEDs, was also found. d.  According to Tulabing, about 100 meters firing wire was laid several hours prior to the detonation.   e.  More or less three (3) persons perpetrated the attack based on the tracks (markings/foot prints) discovered by the troops (from the blast site towards the escape route). Action Taken: a.  One (1) pltn from said unit led by 2LT BALIGNASAY (INF) PA from CP Coy reinforced the engaged troops and subsequently conducted pursuit operations. b. Other Details: NEGATIVE CASUALTY ON THE GOVERNMENT SIDE WHILE TWO (2) KILLED (BC) ON THE ENEMY SIDE IDENTIFIED AS SADAM DENGA DANSALAN AND MUHAIMEN MAGANDIGAN DANSALAN NEPHEW OF A CTN DATU KUNG, FIELD CMDR OF 105TH BC AND RES OF BRGY TAPIKAN 1, SHARIFF AGUAK, MAGUINDANAO. OOA 010155 MAR 10, ALL TROOPS RETURNED TO THEIR RESPECTIVE STATION. THE TWO (2) RECOVERED M16 RIFLES ARE TEMPORARILY DEPOSITED AT SUPPLY ROOM OF 9SRC / SOTG FOR SAFEKEEPING AND PROPER DISPOSITION. Summary Report: On 281100 Feb 2010, TROOPS OF 6TH SFC & 9TH SRC SIGHTED MOL FIVE (5) FULLY ARMED MEN WEARING HALF BDA UNIFORM BELIEVED TO BE CHASING & HUNTING / STEALING CATTLES OWNED BY THE AMPATUAN CLAN IN THE BACK OF MAGUINDANAO PROVINCIAL CAPITOL (51NXH 585 594) SHARIFF AGUAK, MAG. Other Details:
Other Details: TROOPS OF SOTG IMMEDIATELY CEASED FIRE & RETURNED TO TCP (GRM BUILDING). AFTER THE INCIDENT, THE INVOLVED PPMG PERSONNEL WERE PICK – UP BY A WHITE CIVILIAN VEHICLE (MULTI – CAB) WITH TEMPORARY PLATE NUMBER 1222-26620. NEGATIVE CASUALTY HAS BEEN REPORTED.
Action Taken: AFTER CONFIRMING TO TCP 104TH BDE; 46TH IB/8TH ID & PNP UNITS IN THE CAPITOL COMPOUND THAT THERE WERE NO FRIENDLY FORCES IN THE AREA, TROOPS OF 9TH SRC/2ND SRB & 6TH SFC IMMEDIATELY CONDUCTED PATROL TO VERIFY THE ARMED MEN. UPON VISUAL CONTACT TROOPS FIRED THE ARMED MEN WHICH IS MOL 300 METERS DISTANCE FROM THE TCP, SOTG. AFTER TEN (10) MINS, PO1 ARIEL ELUMBA OF 1508TH PPMG ARRIVED IN TCP, SOTG & INFORMED THAT ARMED MEN ARE MEMBERS OF THE 1508TH PPMG & WERE IDENTIFIED AS PO1 EDGAR RECACHO; PO1 JASON JAGONO; PO1 RENCY PALCONETE & PO1 JUN MARC SIAREZ.

RECOVERED IN THE SCENE ARE: ONE (1) EMPTY SHELL OF RG AND TWENTY EIGHT (28) EMPTY SHELLS OF M16 RIFLE.

Other Details: FOR INFORMATION.

Summary Report: RE CATTLE RUSTLING INCIDENT AT BRGY NEW PANDAN, SOUTH UPI, MAG ON 162000H MAR 2010.On 162000 Mar 2010, RE CATTLE RUSTLING OOA 16 2000H MAR 10, (NOT 162300H MAR 10 AS EARLIER REPORTED) TEN (10) FULLY ARMED MEN BELIEVED TO BE CATTLE RUSTLER TOOK FIVE (5) CARABAOS AND TWO (2) HORSES FM THE CIVILIAN POPULACE OF SO BISAYA (NOT SO MALABANG AS EARLIER REPORTED), BRGY PANDAN, SOUTH UPI, MAG. A CTN TOTO MOBOAYAEN WAS ALSO SHOT BY SAID ARMED GROUP ON HIS LEFT FINGER AFTER HIS CARABAOS WERE TAKEN. SAID ARMED GROUP FLED TO NORTHEAST DIRECTION OF SAID BRGY.
Other Details: THREE (3) CARABAOS AND ONE (1) HORSE WERE RECOVERED.  GOV’T SIDE – NEGATIVE CASUALTY WHILE UNDETERMINED CASUALTY ON THE ENEMY SIDE AS EVIDENCES OF BLOOD STAIN FOUND IN THE ENCOUNTER SITE.  AMMO EXPENDITURES: CAL .5.56MM M16 – 90 RDS; CAL 7.62 M14 – 120 RDS AND CAL .30 M1 GARAND – 100 RDS. SAID TROOPS RETURNED STATION AT ABOUT 17 0200H MAR 10.
Action Taken: ONE (1) SEC OF CAA FM PANDAN DET OF 18TH MAG CAA COY LED BY CPL RAMOS (INF) PA CONDUCTED BLOCKING POSITION AT SO PANANG, BRGY PANDAN, SOUTH UPI, MA (51N XH 3956). AT ABOUT 2330H SD, TROOPS ENCOUNTERED SAID ARMED GROUP. FIREFIGHT LASTED FOR 30 MINS. AFTERWHICH, THE ENEMY WITHDREW TO UNKNOWN DIRECTION.

Summary Report: On 181150 Mar 2010, A HAND GRENADE WAS THROWN BY TWO (2) UNIDENTIFIED PERSON THAT EXPLODED INSIDE THE PREMISES OF MAIMONA AMPATUAN SALAZAR (56 YRS OLD, PRINCIPAL OF MAGUINDANAO NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL) AT POBLACION, SHARIFF AGUAK, MAGUINDANAO (51N XH 592 590). Summary Report: On 191730 Mar 2010, SHOOTING INCIDENT TRANSPIRED ALONG TOLINGAN ST, BAGUIA 2, COTABATO CITY (51N XH 365984). WMCCOC13 WESTMINCOM (ARMM) BASILAN (KIDNAPPING) Ref: CNFWM Report RN: CDOG0210116 dtd 27 Feb 2010 On 262010 Feb 2010, The two (2) remaining Chinese Nationals kidnap victims Michael Tan and Oscar Lu were released by their abductors at vicinity Upper Benembengan, Sumisip, Basilan province thru joint effort of PPO, RID PRO ARMM and PACER MAO, they were brought to Infante Hospital in Isabela City for initial check-up/examination.   Action Taken: On or about 262010 Feb 2010, the victims were ferry by IBBN Speedboat from Tabuk, Isabela City to EMP, NSRME, ZC and same transferred to Ciudad Medical, ZC for referral. WMCCOC14 WESTMINCOM (ARMM) BASILAN (ABDUCTION) Ref: C1MBDE Report RN: 1MBDE2032935 dtd 20 Mar 2010 On 131700 Mar 2010, Efren Lindio, 46 years old, Admin Officer of Lamitan National High School reported to pers of 21MC that his wife, Examinda Cristobal Lindio, 43 years old was missing. Allegedly on or about 131530H Mar 2010 his wife went to public market at vicinity oval, Brgy Matibay, Lamitan, BP on board a pedicab but failed to return home. Reportedly, on or about 140450H Mar 2010, a SMS text msg was received by Nancy Magbanua, sister of the victim and Crislyn Faith Lindio, daughter of the victim using cell phone  Nr 09069541337 owned by the victim stating therein that his wife is in good hands and demanded the amount of two (2) million (PHP 2,000,000.00) for the safe released of the victim most likely from a unidentified suspected abductors.  Other Details: 1. Initial information that prior to the incident, Mr and Mrs Lindio had a marital argument allegedly regarding to a illicit  relationship to unidentified text mate of the later. 2. No commotion had transpired at the public market or any indication that there was an abduction that took place at the aforesaid place. Action Taken: 1. Cell phone number of the victim was sent to the higher Hqs for tracking purposes. 2. Elements of 21MC, MBLT1 are intensifying ISO in their AOR to preempt abduction incidents. 3. Intelligence personnel and information of MBLT1 and MBLT9 continue close intelligence monitoring on the family of the victim and the possible abductors.

Summary Report: RE SHOOTING INCIDENT AT AGORA, LAPASAN, CDOC ON 24 0240 MAR 10On 240240 Mar 2010, RE SHOOTING INCIDENT WHICH WAS PERPETRATED BY FOUR (4) UNIDENTIFIED GUNMEN RESULTED TO THE DEATH OF SGT MICHAEL M SENO 797778 (SC) PA AND CPL ROQUE A TAGATONGAN 822212 (INF) PA, ONE (1) CIVILLIAN AND WOUNDING TWO (20 CIVILLIANS LAST 240240 MARCH 2010.
Other Details: CPL ROQUE A TAGALONGAN (INF) PA WAS PERMITTED BY CO, 23IB TO ATTEND THE RECOGNITION CEREMONY OF HIS CHILD AT POBLACION, KIBAWE, BUKIDNON ON 24 MARCH 2010. ON  OR ABOUT 240230 MARCH 2010, CPL TAGALONGON REQUESTED SGT MICHAEL M SENO (SC) PA TO BRING HIM USING A MOTORCYCLE TO AGORA TERMINAL, CAGAYAN DE ORO CITY AS THE FORMER WILL LEAVE FOR KIBAWE, BUKIDNON.  THE DOU, WHILE WAITING FOR A BUS BOUND FOR KIBAWE, BUKIDNON, AS OFFERED BY A WITRESS TO HAVE A COUPLE OF DRINKS IN THEIR RESTAURANT / VIDEOKE BAR. WHEN THE WITRESS GAVE THEM THEIR ORDER OF DRINKS, ONE (1) GLASS ACCIDENTALLY FELL TO ANOTHER PATRON’S TABLE, WHICH CAUSED AN ALTERCATION WHEN THEY IDENTIFIED THEMSELVES AS SOLDIER. IMMEDIATELY, THE ASSAILANT (S) ASKED FOR THEIR ID BUT THEY DID NOT REPLY. WITHOUT ANY WARNING, THE TWO EP WERE SHOT POINT BLANK WITH A CAL .45 PISTOL. SGT SENO SUFFERED ONE (1) GUNSHOT WOUND ON HIS BREAST WHILE CPL TAGALONGAN SUFFERED FOUR (4) GUN SHOT WOUND ON HIS LEFT BREAST THAT CAUSED THEIR UNTIMELY DEATH.  ALSO KILLED IN THE INCIDENT WAS MR LEO G ACEDO WHILE A MR JUN SABALA AND MR JOMAR TACUD WHO WERE AT THE VICINITY WERE WOUNDED WHEN THE INCIDENT TRANSPIRED. MOTIVE OF THE INCIDENT IS STILL UNKNOWN.
Action Taken: INTELLIGENCE PERSONNEL OF 23IB ARE STILL CONDUCTING INVESTIGATION FOR THE POSSIBLE APPRHENSION OF THE SUSPECT IN COORDINATION WITH CAGAYAN DE ORO CITY POLICE OFFICE.

Summary Report: On 290400 Mar 2010, CAA ANTONIO R CANTIAD DL – A002108, 50 YRS OLD AND  FORMER MEMBER OF SANDIG PB/B/72IB WAS STABBED BY UNDET NUMBER OF SUSPECTS AT HIS HOUSE AT BRGY OMPAO, TARRAGONA, DOR. SAID CAA SUSTAINED STAB WOUNDS ON HIS UPPER PART OF ABDOMEN THAT RESULTING TO HIS DEATH.
Other Details: CADAVER OF CAA ANOTNIO R CANTIAD WAS BROUGHT TO ANGEL FUNERAL HOMES, MATI CITY FOR PROPER DISPOSITION. NEXT OF KIN: AURORA R CANTIAD – MOTHER. FOR INFORMATION. 00530- EASTMINCOM (ARMM) MAGUINDANAO (SHOOTING) Ref: 6ID Report RN: 6DTOC – 3003 – 77 – 2010 dtd 30 Mar 2010 On 300630 Mar 2010, SHOOTING INCIDENT TRANSPIRED AT VICINITY MEGA MARKET, POBLACION MOTHER, COTABATO CITY (51N XH 384985). THE VICTIM IDENTIFIED AS TANEX DASNAN DURADO, 28 YRS OLD, ESCORT OF BAILYN AYUNAN, A MAYORALTY CANDIDATE IN PARANG, MAGUINDANAO AND RESIDENT OF PC HILL, COTABATO CITY. INITIAL INVESTIGATION DISCLOSED THAT THE VICTIM WAS WALKING AT SAID PLACE WHEN THREE (3) UNIDENTIFIED PERSONS SUDDENLY APPREARED AND WITHOUT ANY PROVOCATION SHOT THE VICTIM. AFTERWHICH, THE PERPETRATORS FLED TOWARDS UNKNOWN DIRECTION. THE VICTIM SUSTAINED GUNSHOT WOUND ON HIS NECK AND WAS BROUGHT TO CRMC HOSPITAL BUT WAS PRONOUNCED DEAD ON ARRIVAL BY THE ATTENDING PHYSICIAN. FIREARM USED BY THE SUSPECTS COULD NOT DETERMINED AS NO EMPTY SHELLS RECOVERED IN THE CRIME SCENE. THE CASE IS UNDER INVESTIGATION BY COTABATO CITY PNP. MOTIVE – PERSONAL GRUDGE. Other Details: FOR INFORMATION AND REFERENCE.
Action Taken: TROOPS OF TG TUGIS LED BY MSG BACASNO (INF) PA RESPONDED TO THE AREA FOR POSSIBLE APPREHENSION OF PERPETRATORS AND RETURNED STATION WITH NEGATIVE RSULT.

Summary Report: On 302215 Mar 2010, A SHOOTING INCIDENT TRANSPIRED AT VIC 51N XH 372987 PUROK SAMPALOC, MANDAY, BRGY BAGUA, COTABATO CITY. INITIAL INVESTIGATION DISCLOSED THAT UNIDENTIFIED INDIVIDUAL WEARING WHITE T-SHIRT AND MAONG PANTS WAS SEEN WITH ONE (1) MALE COMPANION IDENTIFIED AS DATU NEIL MASTURA ENTERED THE HOUSE AT PUROK  SAMPALOC, MANDAY, BRGY BAGUA, COTABATO CITY. SEVERAL HOURS LATER, GUNSHOTS WERE HEARD AND AFTERWARDS, THE VICTIM WAS FOUND SPRAWLED ON THE CONCRETE PAVEMENT BATHED WITH HIS OWN BLOOD. THE VICTIM SUSTAINED GUNSHOT WOUNDS ON HIS CHEST AND CHEEK THAT CAUSED HIS INSTANTANEOUS DEATH.
Action Taken: THE CASE IS UNDER INVESTIGATION BY PP4, COTABATO CITY POLICE OFFICE. FOR INFORMATION AND REFERENCE.

Summary Report: On 282000 Apr 2010, FOUR (4)  HECTARES OF DOLE BANANA PLANTATION AT  SITIO KABALAWAN 52P AQ 9090, BRGY ANAHAW DAAN, TAGO, SURIGAO DEL SUR WAS CHOPPED BY MOL FIFTY (50) ARMED MEN BELIEVED TO BE MEMBER OF CT UNDER UNKNOWN LEADER. AFTER WHICH, SAID GROUP WITHDREW HEADING TOWARDS UNKNOWN DIRECTION.Other Details:
Other Details: PROGRESS REPORT TO FOLLOW
Action Taken: ONE (1) PLTN OF CAA LED BY CPL NELSON A NACALTUNA 717458 (INF) PA OF DELTA COY, 23IB JUMPED OFF FROM DOLE BANANA PLANTATION, SITIO EBU, BRGY ANAHAW DAAN, TAGO, SURIGAO DEL SUR AND CONDUCTED COMBAT PATROL / ESTABLISHED AMBUSHED POSITION TO POSSIBLE ENEMY ROUTE OF WITHDRAWAL . SAID TROOPS RETURNED STATION AT ABOUT 1000H SAME DAY WITH NO UNTOWARDS INCIDENT. 9067 NCRCOM (REGION IV-A) QUEZON (APPREHENSION) Ref: SOLCOM Report RN: SLCOC-2303-    10 dtd 23 Mar 2010 On 230100 Mar 2010, 1LT NOEL BARICUATRO PA was detained at San Francisco MPS after being held at a checkpoint in Brgy Butanyog, Mulanday, Quezon on suspicion of holding up and ransacking the house of a certain Roland Morenete Garcia a resident of Brgy Tayuman, San Francisco, Quezon on 221800 Mar 10. Four (4) other persons are being hunted.  Suspects fled by using the vehicle of the victim, Isuzu Big Horn Van (PN: XLA 135) and Toyota Corolla (PN: WFJ 968).  The Isuzu Big  Horn was abandoned at Ilayang Yuni, Mulanay, Quezon. Other Details: Subject Officer matched not only the physical description that was disseminated but also he was driving the getaway Car Toyota Corolla (PN: WFJ 968) used by the perpetrators. Said Officer is in the custody of San Francisco MPS and he will be subjected for inquest at Lucena Fiscal Office today.  The 4 suspects are being tracked by the police.  Likewsie, said officer is previously assigned with 74IB but is currently assigned with HHSBn, 2ID DS to TF NILAD.   Action Taken: a.  Immediately MPS San Francisco activiated OPLAN LAMBAT which resulted to the apprehension of 1LT NOEL S BARICUATRO O-136952 (INF) PA at Brgy Butanyog, Mulanay, Quezon on 221930 Mat 10 by elements of MPS Mulanay. b.  201Bde sent QRT in the area to conduct assessment and damage control. c.  74IB is currently following up leads on possible own troops involvement on said incident.

INCIDENT HAPPENED DURING WHEN THE CARRIER VEH IS IN THE AREA USED BY THE TROOPS IS PROVIDING SECURITY TO THE GROUP OF CONGRESSWOMAN LALA TALIÑO WHO WENT ON A CAMPAIGN RALLY AT ARAKAN MUNICIPALITYOther Details:
Enemy Side: Apprehended  Cristito Bulandra   Other Details: Accordingly, the suspect violated PD 1866 as amended by RA 8294. Action Taken: The subject is presently under the custody of the apprehending unit for investigation and filing of appropriate charges. 8926 SOLCOM (REGION III) QUEZON  (CONFISCATION OF FA/DEADLY WEAPONS) Ref: SOLCOM Report RN: SLCOC-1303-251-10 dtd 13 Mar 2010 On 11 Mar 2010, troops of BCoy, 59IB (OPCON to CCoy, 74IB) led by Sgt De Peña PA confiscated one (1) Cal .38 revolver (SN not reported) loaded with ammunition from the possession of suspected LE Mencio Rico while conducting combat patrol at vicinity Sitio Awa, Brgy Huyon-Uyon, San Francisco, Quezon. Action Taken: The suspect was brought to HQ CCoy, 74IB for questioning and further turned-over to MPS San Francisco for appropriate action. 8928 SOLCOM (REGION IV-A) LAGUNA  (ENCOUNTER Ref: SOLCOM Report RN: SLCOC-1303-253-10 dtd 13 Mar 2010 On 12 Mar 2010, acting on the reported presence of armed men in the area, combined elements of 1IB and PNP (Team "Charlie") led by Pfc Sanao (Inf) PA, encountered more or less six (6) armed men, believed to be LEs attempting to rob the 110th Computer Shop at Mona`s Compound, Brgy Real, Calamba City, Laguna.  A brief firefight ensued, afterwhich the suspects withdrew towards South direction.  The troops apprehended one (1) wounded suspect, identified as a certain Jun Ruto and recovered one (1) bolt cutter and the supposed getaway vehicle. Other Details: Accordingly, caretaker Ireneo Mararaig informed the troops in the area about the presence of the suspicious armed men, which was promptly acted upon and caught the suspects on the act of stealing, then firefight ensued. Action Taken: The wounded suspect was brought to the nearest hospital for treatment.  While the recovered vehicle and bolt cutter were turned-over to Calamba City Police for proper disposition. 8937 SOLCOM (REGION III) QUEZON  (APPREHENSION) Ref: SOLCOM Report RN: SLCOC-1303-254-10 dtd 13 Mar 2010 On 122100 Mar 2010, acting on the reported indiscriminate firing in the area, combined troops of Tayabas MPS and 1SFBn under TSg Del Rosario PA apprehended suspect Nelson Cabuyao at vicinity brgy Ilayang Palale, Tayabas, Quezon.  Confiscated from his possession was one (1) Cal 22 magnum, two (2) live and 16 spent ammunition. Action Taken: The suspect was brought to Tayabas MPS for appropriate action. 8952 SOLCOM (REGION IV-A) RIZAL (DEATH BY NATURAL CAUSES) Ref: SOLCOM Report RN: SLCOC-1403-260-10 dtd 15 Mar 2010 On 130100 Mar 2010,  CAA Rolly B Dela Cruz RZ-A050219, 29 yrs old, married and assigned at Pintong Bocaue Det, 3rd Rizal CAA Coy died due to hypertension at his residence at Brgy Pintong Bocaue, San Mateo, Rizal. Other Details: Accordingly, his wife tried to wake up the said CAA when she noticed that CAA Dela Cruz had already urinated in his short pants and had a low pulse rate. She tried to get her husband from the bed but she noticed a blood clot at the back of his neck prompting her to call for assistance from their neighbor. Action Taken: Ooa 140730 Mar 10, one (1) squad of CAA from Pintong Bocaue Det led by PFC Tallion of 59IB (CAFGU) proceeded to the residence of late CAA to provide vigil/assistance to the bereaved family. ECoy Comdr of 59IB (CAFGU) was directed to submit investigation report on the matter. 8981 SOLCOM (REGION V) MASBATE  (APPREHENSION) Ref: SOLCOM Report RN: SLCOC-1703-273-10 dtd 17 Mar 2010 On 15 Mar 2010, combined elements of SWG, 9IB and COLT, 96MICO under 1LT DALAMAN (INF) PA, apprehehended certain Juvel Tunel, Democritico Buradoy and Nelson Torquia for illgeal possession of firearms and ammunition while conducting intelligence operations at vicinity Brgy Matalang-Talang, Aroroy, Masbate.  Confiscated from them were two (2) HM shotguns, one (1) Cal .357 revolver, two (2) magazines for shotgun with four (4) rounds ammunition and one (1) holster.  Action Taken: Apprehended persons and the confiscated items were turned-over to Aroroy MPS for proper disposition. 9053 SOLCOM (REGION IV-A) LAGUNA  (ACCIDENT (GENERAL)) Ref: SOLCOM Report RN: SLCOC-2103-292-10 dtd 21 Mar 2010 On 21 Mar 2010, one (1) M35 truck (PN: SDX 380) of SOLCOM driven by Sgt Ruben Cafe PAF collided with a N. Dela Rosa Liner (PN: TYU 866) along Maharlika Highway, Brgy San Vicente, San Pablo City, Laguna.  The incident resulted to the injury of Sgt Cafe PAF, SSg Talain PA, Hilario Mindanao (bus driver) and one (1) unidentified passenger. Other Details: The said military vehicle was on its way to HQ SOLCOM after performing official mission at GHQ, CGEA, Quezon City. Action Taken: a.  The victims sustained minor injuries and were brought to Community Hospital in San Pablo City for treatment.  The military personnel were further transfered to CNSH at HQ SOLCOM. b.  MAJ REINDE PA, Acting U4, SOLCOM proceeded to the  site to facilitate the disposition of the M35 truck and report at San Pablo City PNP. 9054 SOLCOM (REGION IX) ZAMBOANGA CITY (LIGHTNING) Ref: 1ID, PA Report RN: 1DC-2103-575-2010 dtd 21 Mar 2010 On 211427 Mar 2010, CCoy of 10IB, Base at Brgy Bunawan, Goddod, ZDN, was hit by a lightning  which damaged the electrical out-let of radio/signal room while two (2) EP namely: Pfc Gerardo C Lamostre (Inf) PA and Pfc Joel Mecto (Inf) PA who was respectively at the bunker and kitchen at that time,  suffered electric shock. Action Taken: Said EP were brought to Godod Emergency Clinic for medical treatment. 9073 SOLCOM (REGION V) MASBATE (SEARCH AND SEIZURE) Ref: 9ID, PA Report RN: TGH-SL-2203-25-2010 dtd 22 Mar 2010 On 170630 Mar 2010, combined elements of 9IB under 1LT RANDY A BERONIA 0-135700 (INF) PA, 76MICO led by Pfc Racel D Punzalan 850215 (Inf) PA, RPSMB under PSINSP BALLA PNP and Masbate PPO (AFP-PNP STF Masbate) conducted search and seaizure operations at the house of Brgy Chmn Geronimo I Remulta Sr at vicinity Brgy Tan-awan, Placer, Masbate by virtue of Search Warrant issued by Hon Judge MAXIMINO R ABLES, presiding judge of RTC Br 54, Gubat, Sorsogon for violation of RA 8294 (Illegal Possession of Firearm & Ammunition) at the premises described under the search warrant yielded negative result. Other Details: a.  However, while on the process of the search, the Brgy Chrmn and his son, voluntarily surrendered to the searching elements two (2) HPFAs, one (1) LPFAs, ammunitions and magazines. b.  The Brgy Chmn and his son Geronimo Jr were later released after presenting valid documents and authority to possess firearms. Action Taken: Confiscated firearms, magazines and ammunition are presently under the custody of AFP-PNP STF Masbate. 9114 SOLCOM (REGION IV-A) RIZAL (VEHICULAR ACCIDENT) Ref: SOLCOM Report RN: SLCOC-2603-307-10 dtd 26 Mar 2010 On 24 Mar 2010, SSg Edwin D Pabon (Inf) PA, Det Commander of Pinugay Detachment, 3rd Rizal CAA Coy, ECoy, 59CBn, 2ID, PA met an accident while riding his motorcycle at vicinity Sitio Palo, Alto, Brgy Pinugay, Baras, Rizal. Other Details: Subject EP came from a meeting with Brgy Pinugay Council as part of the ITDS building. He sustained injuries in his face and lower extremities. Action Taken: SSg Pabon was brought to Baras Hospital for medical treatment. 9146 SOLCOM (REGION IV-A) LAGUNA  (VEHICULAR ACCIDENT) Ref: SOLCOM Report RN: SLCOC-2803-313-10 dtd 28 Mar 2010 On 26 Mar 2010, Pfc Jorge S Lapuente 842236 (Inf) PA and Pfc Jayjay B Satuito 873160 (Inf) PA both personnel of ACoy, 1IB, PA while enroute to Coy CP met a vehicular accident when they collided with a white pick-up truck along Lagumbay St. Brgy Lewin, Lumban, Laguna.
Government Side: KIA Pfc  Jayjay B Satuito PA    WIA Pfc  Jorge S Lapuente PA    Other Details: On 270600 Mar 10, personnel manning the checkpoint led by Sgt Arnel S Capellan (Inf) PA noticed that Pfc Satuito was not breathing and this prompted the said troops to bring said EP to Holy Family Medical Clinic in Pagsanjan, Laguna but the attending physician pronouced him dead upon arrival. Action Taken: a. The two (2) EP were brought to Laguna Provicial Hospital for medical treatment. Pfc Satuito PA who had injuries opted to take a rest in the KM450 vehicle that responded at the scene. b. Pfc Lapuente PA who was injured at the back of his head was immediately evacuated to V-Luna Medical Center. 7913 CENTCOM (REGION VII) BOHOL  (DEATH BY NATURAL CAUSES) Ref: CENTCOM Report RN: 8D8-OPN-269-04-03-10 dtd 04 Mar 2010 On 23 Feb 2010, CAA Alex Y Laquinta BH-AO52465 of 2nd CAA Coy, 2nd SFBn committed suicide his residence at Sitio Bugho, Brgy Abelihan, San Isidro, Bohol. Other Details: Based on the autopsy report, the bullet`s (cal 38 revolver) point of entry is from his mouth and exited at the lower optimal area.   Action Taken: The remains of said CAA was already buried at San Isidro Public Cemetery last 24 Feb 2010. 7925 CENTCOM (REGION VIII) SAMAR  (MIS-ENCOUNTER) Ref: 8ID, PA Report RN: 8D8-OPN-277-05-03-10 dtd 05 Mar 2010 On 05 Mar 2010, troops of ACoy, 34IB under 1LT RODRIGO LATONIO (INF) PA  (composed of 1 Officer & 18 EP) and 2LT SEGUNDO LAPIGUERA (INF) PA (composed of 1 Officer & 17 EP), while on combat operations, mis-encountered at vicinity Brgy Concepcion (51P YP 253152), Paranas, Samar.  The incident resulted to one (1) KIA, identified as Pvt Winston G Mores 879434 (Inf) PA. Action Taken: a.  8ID, PA created a Board of Inquiry (BOI) headed by COL ALEXANDER D CABALES MNSA (INF) PA, CIG to determine the circumstances behind the incident. b.  A special report will be submitted as soon as necessary information are gathered. 7930 CENTCOM (REGION VIII) SAMAR  (MIS-ENCOUNTER) Ref: 8ID, PA Report RN: 8D8-OPN-280-05-03-10 dtd 05 Mar 2010 Progress Report to Journal Item Nr: 7925 dtd 05 Mar 10, re mis-encounter of ACoy, 34IB under 1LT LATONIO (INF) PA and 2LT LAPIGUERA (INF) PA at vicinity Brgy Concepcion, Paranas, Samar on 050210 Mar 10.  Other Details: a.  In addition to the lone fatality (previously reported), three (3) others were wounded, namely: Cpl Crisostomo gabuay 828965 (Inf) PA, Pfc Antonio S Cortez III 833655 (FA) PA and Pfc Christopher Rapanot 857898 (Inf) PA. b.  The casualties were troops of 2nd Pltn of said unit under 2LT LAPIGUERA (INF) PA. c.  The KIA (Pvt Mores) sustained GSW on the face (right eye). WIA Cpl Gabuay PA sustained GSWs on the right portion of the body (ear, leg & arm), while the two (2) other WIAs were slightly wounded on the face. Action Taken: a.  After the incident, troops under 1LT LATONIO PA proceeded to Brgy  Concepcion proper of the same municipality, while troops under 2LT LAPIGUERA (INF) PA proceeded to Brgy Calapi, Motiong of the same province. b. Other Details: Investigation stated that prior to the shooting incident, subject EP had a heated argument with some of his men. After a while, he went inside his bunker when suddenly, a single shot of gunfire was heard outside his bunker. CAA personnel who was still awake at that time rushed into the area and saw the subject EP who had a gun shot wound at his right chest. The bullet traversed through his armpit and eventually broke the bone of his right shoulder. Subject EP was immediately rushed to Lubuagan Public Hospital and was further evacuated to Kalinga Provincial Hospital, Bulanao, Tabuk, Kalinga for further medical treatment. Action Taken: Bn Cmdr instructed CO, ECoy to direct intel NCO of same Coy to proceed at Kalinga Provincial Hospital to closely monitor the medical status of subject EP and to conduct thorough investigation. 7887 NOLCOM (REGION III) NUEVA ECIJA (RECOVERY OF WAR MATERIEL) Ref: NOLCOM Report RN: CN-0348-01-03-10 dtd 02 Mar 2010 On 020200 Mar 2010, operating troops from 71MIC, 81IB and 702Bde, 7ID, PA discovered RYS depot containing MOL eight hundred (800) rds of 5.56 ammunition contained in two (2) metal boxes with markings "Gov`t Arsenal DND lot CDA 9924" while conducting operations at Sitio Dalipawan, Brgy Bunga, Carranglan, Nueva Ecija. Action Taken: Recovered items were brought to H71MICO, Brgy Calaanan, Bongabon, NE for safekeeping prior proper disposition. 7908 NOLCOM (CAR) KALINGA (SHOOTING) Ref: 5ID, PA Report RN: D3-03-03-09 dtd 03 Mar 2010 Progress Report to Journal Item Nr: 7883 dtd 02 Mar 10, re shooting of TSg Jose Binalay (Inf) PA, Detachment Comdr, ECOy, 77IB (CADRE) by CAAs at Mallango Detachment of said unit located at Brgy Mallango, Tinglayan, Kalinga on 272130 Feb 10. Other Details: a. Initial investigation disclosed that prior to the incident, the victim, with CAA Javier Agyao, CAA Joel Soyabo and the suspect (CAA Brilante Matnao) had a drinking session at vicinity Sitio Centro of said brgy (about 100 meters from the detachment). After consuming two (2) bottles of gin, TSg Binalay PA and CAA Agyao decided to go back to the detachment ahead of the group.  After a few minutes, CAA Soyaba and the suspect followed and immediately proceeded to their bunker.  The two (2) CAAs repeatedly loaded their respective issued M14 rifle inside the bunker, which caught the attention of TSg Binalay PA, who was then resting/lying on the bed.  TSg Binalay PA proceeded to the bunker of CAA Matnao and CAA Soyabo to pacify the duo and then went back to his bunker.   After a few minutes, CAA Matnao indiscriminately fired his  issued rifle onto the air.  Still not contented, he moved nearer to the bunker of said EP and uttered the word "Rumuar Ka" (get out).  When he lost his patience for the non-appearance of the victim, he immediately fired 7 rounds towards the bunker. Sensing that he hit the EP, he told CAA Soyaba to accompany him in going home at Sitio Bangad of said brgy, bringing along with them their issued rifle. b.  The suspect bringing along the rifles and ammunitions and accompanied by their parents surrendered at Tinglayan MPS. Action Taken: a.  On 011130 March 10, 1LT FERNANDO LAWI-AN JR, CO ECoy, 77IB (CADRE), with Sgt Gumtang PA and SPO2 Bulao PNP proceeded to said detachment to conduct investigation. b.  Elements of Tinglayan Detachment of said unit under TSg Pagulayan PA recovered the two (2) M14 rifles (SNs: 866798 & 1376998), two (2) magazines and 27 rounds ammunition. c.  TSg Binalay PA was evacuated to CVMC, Tuguegarao City for treatment. 7940 NOLCOM (CAR) ABRA (ACCIDENT (GENERAL)) Ref: NOLCOM Report RN: CN-0380-0603-10 dtd 06 Mar 2010 On 05 Mar 2010, Sgt Joel M Lanana 837173 (AGS) PA, DS to 503IBDe as Liaison NCO of MBO, 5ID, PA fall down while carrying one (1) cavan of rice for the re supply of MBO, 41IB inside HQ 503Bde, Brgy Tagodtod, Lagangilang, Abara. Accordingly, the radio had no "jacket", which forced the RTO to secure it in one (1) of his combat pack`s pockets, unfortunately fot loose and fell somewhere at a rolling terrain towards to their objective. Action Taken: Troops under 2LT VELANO PA and 2LT CADALIG PA searched the area for the said item.  Likewise, troops of SWG of said unit were alerted to join the search.  Furthermore, COLT, 21IB was mobilized to conduct intensified intelligence operations in the area.  7928 SOLCOM (REGION IV-A) RIZAL  (ACCIDENT (GENERAL)) Ref: SOLCOM Report RN: SLCOC-0403-210-10 dtd 04 Mar 2010 On 03 Mar 2010, the motorcycle ridden by Pfc James Operaña (Inf) PA of CCoy, 16IB side swept a certain Josefina Aurora Orayes along Marcos Highway, Brgy Mayamot, Antipolo City, Rizal, that caused victim`s untimely death. Action Taken: a.  The 65 yr old victim was brought by Pfc Operaña PA at Amang Rodriguez Hospital in Marikina CIty for treatment, but unfortunetely died on 040800 Mar 10. b.  Subject EP is presently detained at the Antipolo City PNP detention center. 7956 SOLCOM (REGION IV-A) BATANGAS  (ACCIDENT (GENERAL)) Ref: SOLCOM Report RN: SLCOC-0803-227-10 dtd 08 Mar 2010 On 07 Mar 2010, one (1) KM450 of 202Bde driven by Pfc Michael B Gumiran (Inf) PA collided with a motorcycle driven by a certain Carlito Recamara with three (3) backriders along Maharlika Highway, Nasugbu, Batangas.  The accident resulted to the death of Maria Cristina Recamara and the injury of the driver, his wife Nolita and five (5) yr old daughter Maybelyn.  Other Details: a.  Initial investigation disclosed that the vehicle was transporting the troops of said unit led by 1LT MARIADITA K OMANDAM (QMS) PA to said municipality to attend a School Symposium.  Upon further investigation, it was found out that vehicle`s bumper (left portion) accidentally hit the incoming motorcycle from the opposite lane. b.  Maria Cristina Recamara died while undergoing treatment at the United Candelaria Doctor`s Hospital, Brgy Mangilag of said municipality. c.  The accident damage both vehicles. Action Taken: a.  The injured victims were brought to the nearest hospital for treatment. b.  202Bde coordinated with the victims` families for assistance. c.  202Bde in coorodination with the PNP conducted investigation relative to the accident. d.  Both vehicles are presenlty under the custody of the PNP for documentation and safekeeping. 7983 SOLCOM (REGION V) MASBATE (APPREHENSION) Ref: SOLCOM Report RN: SLCOC-1003-236-10 dtd 10 Mar 2010 On 04 Mar 2010, joint elements of AFP-PNP STF Masbate and Aroroy MPS led by PSUPT OSCAR R REGALA JR and one (1) squad of 9IB, 9ID, PA led by Sgt Candor PA conducted search and seizure operation at the residencre of Iven Samson y Sta Clara at vicinity Brgy Bangon, Aroroy, Masbate.

Summary Report: On 131930 Mar 2010, SCAA JUVER MELENDRES PRESENTLY ASSIGNED AT JOINT TASK FORCE GENSAN WHILE ON OFF DUTY INDISCRIMINATELY FIRED HIS ISSUED M16 RIFLE (SN 4307662) AT  PUROK 6, BRGY GLAMANG, POLOMOLOK, SOUTH COTABATO WHICH RESULTED TO KILLING OF CERTAIN JEROME LUMAHANG AND WOUNDING A CERTAIN JEROME CERBEÑAS. AFTERWHICH, SAID SCAA FLED TO SITIO, LUSOK, BRGY BASAG, T’BOLI, SOUTH COTABATO USING HIS HONDA XRM 125 MOTORCYCLE PLATE NR M19814.Other Details:
Other Details: PROGRESS REPORT TO FOLLOW.

Summary Report: RE ACCIDENTAL FIRING COMMITTED BY SCAA JUVER MELENDRES AT PUROK 6, BRGY GLAMANG, POLOMOLOK, SOUTH COTABATO.On 131930 Mar 2010, RE INDISCRIMINATE FIRING OF SCAA JUVER MELENDRES OF JOINT TASK FORCE GENSAN WHILE  RESULTED TO KILLING OF CERTAIN JEROME LUMAHANG AND WOUNDING A CERTAIN JEROME CERBEÑAS  AT  PUROK 6, BRGY GLAMANG, POLOMOLOK, SCOT OOA 13 1930H MAR 10.
Other Details: PRIOR TO THE INCIDENT, SCAA MELENDRES AND SSG RODRIGO S COTAMORA (INF) PA, ORGANIC PERS OF JFTG WENT TO THE HOUSE OF MELENDRE’ SISTER LOCATED AT SITIO LUSOG, BRGY BASAG, T’BOLI, SCOT TO ATTEND THE BIRTHDAY CELEBRATION THEREAT. AT ABOUT 1400H SAME DAY, THE DUO WITH ALBERTO MELENDRES (FATHER OF SCAA MELENDRES) LEFT THE AREA AND PROCEEDED TO HJTF GENSAN AT BULA, GSC SINCE THE DUO WERE THE DETAILED AS SENTINEL OF POST NR 1 OF HJTFG FROM 131500H-1800H MAR 10. AT ABOUT 1600H SAME DAY, SCAA MELENDRES ABANDONED HIS POST UNNOTICED BY SSG COTAMORA BRINGING ALONG HIS ISSUED M16 RIFLE AND BANDOLER WEARING BDA  AND PROCEEDED TO SITIO LUSOK, BRGY BASAG, T’BOLI, SCOT. AT ABOUT 1800H SAME DAY, SCAA MELENDRES LEFT SITIO LUSOG, BRGY BASAG, T’BOLI, SCOT AND PROCEEDED TO PRK 5, BRGY GLAMANG POLOMOLOK, SCOT. AT ABOUT 1900H SD, THE SUBJ SCAA DELIBERATELY POINT HIS M16 RIFLE TO THE CIVILIANS PLAYING BASKETBALL IN THE BASKETBALL COURT OF PRK 5, GLAMANG, POLOMOLOK, SCOT, THE ACTIVITY OF THE SUBJECT SCAA PROMPTED THE BRGY OFFICIALS & TANODS TO CALL THE ATTENTION OF THE PNP POLOMOLOK TO RESPOND ON THE NOTICED THREAT. AT ABOUT 1915H SAME DAY, PNP POLOMOLOK RESPONDED TO THE AREA BUT DID NOT APPREHEND THE SUBJECT SCAA SINCE HE HIDES AT THE ONE OF THE HOUSE IN THE AREA. THE PNP WITH THE BRGY CHAIRMAN IN THE AREA DECIDE TO BRING THE MOTORCYCLE OF THE SUBJECT SCAA TO PNP POLOMOLOK. AT ABOUT 1930H SD , THE SUBJECT SCAA CAME OUT FROM HIDING PLACE AND NOTICED THAT HIS MOTORCYCLE WAS NO WHERE TO BE FOUND, THIS PROMPTED HIM TO FIRE HIS WEAPON INDISCRIMINATELY TO THE DIFFERENT DIRECTIONS THAT RESULTED TO THE INCIDENT. SUBJECT SCAA CARNAPPED THE SAID MOTORCYCLE (XRM COLORED BLACK WITH PLATE NR 9814) OWNED BY OLIVER SAJONIA OF PRK 6, BRGY GLAMANG, POLOMOLOK, SCOT AND USED AS GATE AWAY VEHICLE.  PROGRESS REPORT TO FOLLOW.
Action Taken: CPT ALMORATO, MSG CAY (DUTY SG OF JTFG), MSG CORPUZ (S2 PERS) AND SGT MAJOR OF JTFG TOGETHER WITH THE ALERT TEAM RESPECTIVELY RESPONDED TO THE INCIDENT PURPOSELY TO APPREHEND SCAA MELENDRES BUT THE SUBJECT SCAA WAS ALREADY ESCAPED

Said equipment is being used in illegal mining operation. Action Taken: Said equipment was brought to FPPI for safekeeping. 8943 EASTMINCOM (REGION XII) COTABATO (SHOOTING) Ref: 6ID, PA Report RN: DTOC-1303-39-10 dtd 14 Mar 2010 On 13 Mar 2010, SSg Narcy C Vertudazo 779894 (Inf) PA presently assigned with HHC, 38IB, 6ID, PA was shot by undidentified assailant using cal .45 pistol at vicinity corner Angel Bacani St., and ND Ave., Cotabato City. Other Details: Subject EP sustained four (4) gun shot wounds on his left chest and abdomen. Action Taken: One (1) team from Hq ECoy, 38IB led by Cpl Celestial PA proceeded to the crime scene to rescue the victim and brought subject EP to Cotabato Medical Hospital for medical treatment. 8945 EASTMINCOM (REGION XII) SOUTH COTABATO (ACCIDENTAL FIRING) Ref: EASTMINCOM Report RN: EMCOC-1408-415-10 dtd 14 Mar 2010 On 12 Mar 2010, SCAA Juver Melendres presently assigned at Joint Task Force Gensan while on off duty, indiscriminately fired his issued M16 rifle (SN: 4307662) at Purok 6, Brgy Glamang, Polomolok, South cotabato which resulted to the killing of one (1) civilian identified as Jerome Lumahang and wounding of a certain Jerome Cerbeñas. Other Details: After the incidetn, SCAA Melendres fled to Sitio Lusok, Brgy Basag, T`boli, South Cotabato on board his Honda XRM 125 motorcycle with PN MI 9814. 8946 EASTMINCOM (REGION XI) COMPOSTELA VALLEY (HARASSMENT) Ref: EASTMINCOM Report RN: EMCOC-1403-418-10 dtd 15 Mar 2010 On 141030 Mar 2010, personnel guarding the Mining Tunnel/Portal owned by a certain Dondon Cinco located at vicinity Brgy Pantinran, Maragusan, Compostela Valley Province was harassed by more or less seven (7) armed men. Firefight lasted for about five (5) minutes afterwhich, the said gunmen withdrew towards unknown direction. No casualty was reported on both sides. Other Details: It was found out that there was a misunderstanding between the owner and operators of the Mining Tunnel. Action Taken: One (1) section from BCoy, 66IB, 5SRC and CAA from Poblacion Maragusan PB led by 1LT LOPEZ (INF) PA and operative of 66IB proceeded towards the area to conduct investigation thereat. 8948 EASTMINCOM (REGION XII) SOUTH COTABATO (INDISCRIMINATE FIRING) Ref: EASTMINCOM Report RN: EMCOC-1403-418-10 dtd 14 Mar 2010 Progress Report to Journal Item Nr: 8945 dtd 14 Mar 2010, re-indiscrination firing of SCAA Juver Melendres of Joint Task Force Gensan while resulted to killing of certain Jerome Lumahang and wounding a certain Jerome Cerbeñas at Purok 6, Brgy Glamang, Polomolok, SCot on 131930 Mar 2010.  Other Details: a. Prior to the incident, SCAA Melendres and SSg Rodrigo S Cotamora (Inf) PA, organic personnel of JFT Gensan, went to the house of Melendres` sister located at Sitio Lusog, Brgy Basag, T`boli, South Cotabato to attend the birthday celebration thereat. b. At about 1400H same day, the duo together with a certain Alberto Melendres (father of SCAA Melendres) left the area and proceeded to Hq JT Gensan at Bula, General Santos City since the two CAAs were the detailed as sentinnel at Post Nr 1 of HJFTG from 131500 - 1800H Mar 10. c. At about 1600H, SCAA Melendres abandoned his post unnoticed by SSg Cotamora PA bringing along his issued M16 rifle and bandoleer, wearing BDA uniform and proceeded to Sitio Lusok, Brgy Basag, T`Boli, South Cotabato.  d. At about 1800H said SCAA proceeded to Purok 5, Brgy Glamang, Polomolok of the same province. At about 1900H same day, subject SCAA deliberately pointed his M16 rifle to the civilians playing basketball in the court of Purok 5, Brgy Blamang, the unruly behavior of SCAA Melendres was noticed by the residence of the said barangay and this prompted the Brgy Officials and Tanods to call the attention of the PNP Polomolok to respond to the area but was not able to apprehend the said SCAA since he hid at one (1) of the houses in the area. e. The PNP with Brgy Chairman in the area decided to bring the motorcyle of SCAA Melendres to PNP Polomolok. f. At about 1930H same day, SCAA Melendres came out from hiding and noticed that his motorcyle was nowhere to be found.  This prompted him to fire his weapon indiscriminately to the different directions and resulted to the killing of Jerome Lumahang and wounding of Jumar Cerbeñas. f. Accordingly, SCAA Melendres carnapped the XRM motorcycle owned by Oliver Sajonia of the same barangay and was used as his get away vehicle and fled towards uknown direction. Action Taken: At about 1945H same day, CPT ALMORATO, MSg Cay (Duty SG of JTFG), MSg Corpuz (S2 personnel) and Sgt Major of JTF Gensan together with the alert team, responded to the incident purposely to conduct investigation and apprehend SCAA Melendres but the subject already escaped. 8954 EASTMINCOM (REGION XII) COTABATO CITY (SHOOTING) Ref: 6ID, PA Report RN: 6DTOC-1503-33-2010 dtd 15 Mar 2010 On 142346 Mar 2010, a certain Ali Molod of legal age and a resident of Shariff Kabunsuan, Pob 3, Cotabato City was shot to death while on his way towards his house at vic Purok Bualan, Pob 2, Cotabato City by unidentified suspect.  The victim was shot at his back three times and once of his head that caused his instantaneous death. The suspect fled towards unknown direction while the victim was brought to his residence for proper disposition. Motive of the shooting was personal grudge. Action Taken: One (1) mobile team from TG Tugis reponded to the scene of incident for possible apprehension of the suspect but yielded negative result. Case is under investigation by Police Precint # 1, Cotabato City. 8955 EASTMINCOM (REGION XII) NORTH COTABATO (SHOOTING) Ref: 6ID, PA Report RN: 6DTOC-1503-34-2010 dtd 15 Mar 2010 On 141415 Mar 2010,  a certain Penseng Samayatin, 40 yrs, married, a businessman and a resident of Brgy Kabasalan, Pikit, North Cotabato was shot by two (2) unidentified suspects who were riding Bajaj Kawasaki motorcycle bearing plate number CT100 at the vicinity of Matalam St, Brgy Poblacion, Pikit, North Cotabato using Cal .40 pistol as evidenced by the empty shells recovered from the crime scene. Investigation disclosed that the victim was onboard a public utility jeep (Lawin) while the suspects shot him several times and hitting him at the different parts of his body afterwhich the perpetrators fled towards unknown direction. Other Details: The victim was rushed to Cruzado Medical Hospital for treatment but was declared dead on arrival (DOA) by the attending Physician. Motive of incident is still unknown. Action Taken: Intel personnel of 7IB coordinated with PNP for possible apprehension and possibly identify the suspects. 8964 EASTMINCOM (CARAGA) AGUSAN DEL NORTE (DEATH BY NATURAL CAUSES) Ref: EASTMINCOM Report RN: EMCOC-1503-427-10 dtd 15 Mar 2010 On 131500 Mar 2010, SSg Carlito D Guimalan 706057 (Inf) PA, a personnel of 10MIB, 10ID, PA died due to Cardiac Arrest after being rushed to Santos Hospital, Butuan City.  Other Details: a. Accordingly, SSg Guimalan was permitted to go home in Sitio New Leyte, Brgy Awa, Prosperidad, ADS to secure his supporting papers for promotion. While at his residence, subject EP was rushed to the Plaza Memorial Hospital, Patin-ay ADS due to Hypertension. He was further brought to Santos Hospital in Butuan City for proper medication. However SSg Guimalan was declared dead by the attending physician at about same day. b. The cadaver of said EP now lies at his residence in Sitio New Leyte, Brgy Awa, Prosperidad, ADS. 8965 EASTMINCOM (REGION XII) NORTH COTABATO (DEATH BY NATURAL CAUSES) Ref: EASTMINCOM Report RN: EMCOC-1503-425-10 dtd 15 Mar 2010 On 141700 Mar 2010, Msg Dalmacio U Bagac 660977 (Inf) PA of HHSC, 25IB stationed at Camp Kalaw, Monkayo, CVP, who was suffering from Squamos Cell CA Bucal (moderately differentiated stage 4) while undergoing treatment as out patient died at his residence at Brgy Pob 2, Pigkawayan, North Cotabato. Other Details: Accordingly, Pfc Sanboranay (Inf) PA was on over night pass and was on his way to Valencia City to assist  his wifes` scheduled pre-natal check-up and prepare their financial needs. Nearest kin: Mr Romulo G Robles SR-Father. 9004 EASTMINCOM (CARAGA) SURIGAO DEL SUR (APPREHENSION) Ref: 4ID, PA Report RN: OPN-1903-622-2010 dtd 19 Mar 2010 On 151600 Mar 2010, PINSP BENNY ESPARAGOZA, COP, Hinatuan MPS, Hinatuan, Surigao del Sur requested assistance to 58IB regarding the reported illegal checkpoint conducted by unknown personalities and allegedly a revolutionary tax colletion activity of CTM at Sitio Bingcongan and San Miguel, both of Brgy Bigaan, Hinatuan, Surigao del Sur.

TROOPS STILL IN THE AREA 00549- EASTMINCOM (REGION XII) NORTH COTABATO (VEHICULAR ACCIDENT) Ref: 6ID Report RN: 6DTOC – 3103 – 83 – 2010 dtd 31 Mar 2010 On 311415 Mar 2010, THE TROOPS CARRIER VEH OF 57IB MANNED AND DRIVEN BY PFC JET T NONOK (INF) PA ACCIDENTALLY SIDE SWEEP WHILE TAKING A U-TURN ALONG MSR OF BRGY NEW PONTEVEDRA (51 YJ 143099), ANTIPAS, NCOT BY ONE UNIT ISUZU PICK UP WITH PLATE NR LCS 486 OWNED BY MR ABNER FRANCISCO AND DRIVEN BY A CTN PHILLIP GULMATICO. INCIDENT HAPPENED DURING WHEN THE CARRIER VEH IS IN THE AREA USED BY THE TROOPS IS PROVIDING SECURITY TO THE GROUP OF CONGRESSWOMAN LALA TALIÑO WHO WENT ON A CAMPAIGN RALLY AT ARAKAN MUNICIPALITY Other Details: THE TROOP CARRIER OBTAINED A SLIGHT DAMAGE ON THE LEFT MOST SIDE OF ITS BUMPER WHILE THE ISUZU PICK UP ALSO OBTAINED A SLIGHT DAMAGE/ SCRATCH ON THE FRONT DOOR RIGHT SIDE PORTION   Action Taken: 1LT SERNA, CO, CHARLIE COY, 57IB MADE A PHONE CALL AND CONFERRED WITH MR ABNAR FRANCISCO OWNER OF THE VEH AND MADE AN AMICABLE SETTLEMENT ON THE MATTER. 7885 EASTMINCOM (REGION XII) COTABATO (SHOOTING) Ref: 6ID, PA Report RN: 6DTOC-0103-01-269-10 dtd 01 Mar 2010 On 011200 Mar 2010, a shooting incident transpired at vic Sinsuat Avenue Rosary Heights 6, Cotabato City. The victim was identified as Ticky Barroga, 50 yrs old, married, resident of Doña Theresa, Pob 2 of same city, and head of City Accessors Office of Cotabato City. Other Details: a. Initial investigation revealed that the victim, on board a white Toyota Corola vehicle with plate number LDA 866, together with his driver, a certain Joseph Delicano, married, a resident of Peñafrancia, Brgy RH 11 and administrative aid-1V of same office after coming from City Hall Palace were followed by two (2) unident persons on board a red Honda XRM motorcycle with unknown plate number. Upon reaching the said place, the suspects overtook their vehicle and without any provocation fired several shots at the victims. Afterwhich, the perpetrators fled towards unknown direction. b. Mr Ricky Barroga sustained gunshot wounds on the different parts of his body while the driver, Joseph Delicano, sustained gunshot wound on his right arm. Both victims were brought to Notre Dame Hospital Cotabato City but Mr Barroga was declared DOA by the attending physician. c. Recovered in the crime scene were empty shells of Cal .45 pistol believed to be used by the perpetrators. The case is now under investigation by Cotabato City PNP. Action Taken: Intel operatives of TG Tugis led by 1LT SILVERTRE R CASTO JR (INF) PA rushed to the scene of incident in order to identify the suspects and determine the motive of the incident. 7904 EASTMINCOM (ARMM) MAGUINDANAO (HOLDUP/ROBBERY) Ref: EASTMINCOM Report RN: EMCOC-0203-356-10 dtd 02 Mar 2010 On 020900 Mar 2010, a hold-up transpired at Sitio, Fata, Brgy Pandan, South Upi, Maguindanao. Accordingly, the motorcycle ridden by Ms Ailene Hiso Madrio of legal age, from Brgy Pandan going to Brgy Timanan all of South Upi, Maguindanao was flagged down by four (4) unidentified person armed with 12 gauge shotgun and bladed weapon. The perpetrators took P30,000.00 cash and other valuable items valuable items from the victim with an estimated total of P50,000.00. Said armed men fled towards unknown direction. Action Taken: One (1) fire team from Fata Det led by Cpl Galapin (Inf) PA immediately responded to the area but yielded negative result. 7905 EASTMINCOM (REGION XII) SOUTH COTABATO (RAID) Ref: EASTMINCOM Report RN: EMCOC-0203-357-10 dtd 02 Mar 2010 On 021430 Mar 2010, combined elements of 27IB composed of one (1) team intel operative, one (1) team scout pltn under 1LT EDWIN I PIA (INF) PA, 2LT PORTO (INF) PA; PDEA XII, SCPO led by agent Adrian G Lavariño and PSUPT CONDEZ raided an establishment at Sitio Atbangan, Brgy Tubeng, Tupi, South Cotabato.

Summary Report: On 140000 Mar 2010, INITIAL REPORT FM 4ID STATE THAT ON-GOING FOREST FIRE AT GS 1466, SO DUGO-DUGO, BRGY PELAEZ, CLAVERIA MIS OR. SAID FIRE CONFLAGRATION STARTED THREE (3) DAYS AGO & ALREADY AFFECTED AN ESTIMATED 6 SQUARE KM.Action Taken:
Other Details: a. The populace residing at the coastal areas of Hinatuan, Surigao del Sur including four (4) barangays started to evacuate upon receiving the information even without the order from the MDCC. b. Estimated number of evacuees were approximately 5,000 individuals who gathered at Brgy Bitoon and Sitio Cantabon, Brgy Sasa, 3 kilometers away from the town while patients who were admitted at Hinatuan District Hospital were secured at Tagasaka National High School, 8 kms away from town proper. 7953 EASTMINCOM (REGION XII) COTABATO  (BURNING) Ref: 6ID, PA Report RN: 6DTOC-0703-13-2010 dtd 07 Mar 2010 On 071242 Mar 2010, a conflagration transfired at vic Brgy Bagua 1, Cotabato City at one (1) storey residential house owned by a certain Saidali. Said house was made of seventy (70) percent concrete materials. Initial investigation revealed that the fire started at the mezzanine area of said house. Cause of fire is still under investigation by the elements of BFP, Cotabato City. Negative casualty and injured during the incident. Estimated cost of damage is MOL fifty thousand (50,000.00) pesos. Action Taken: Operatives from TG Tugis rushed to the area to determine the cause of fire. 8953 EASTMINCOM (REGION X) MISAMIS ORIENTAL (BURNING) Ref: EASTMINCOM Report RN: EMCOC-1503-420-2010 dtd 15 Mar 2010 On 150925 Mar 2010,  initial report from 4ID stated that a forest fire occured at GS 1466, Sitio Dugo-Dugo, Brgy Pelaez, Claveria Misamis Oriental. Said fire started  about three (3) days ago and burned an estimate of 6 square kilometers of the forest. Action Taken: LGU and DENR assessed the damage and implemented control measures inorder to avoid further escalation of said incident. 3Air Division was informed inorder to provide appropriate aircrafts for aerial recon. OTHER EVENT (OE) REPORT: MILF:
Action Taken: LGU & DENR ARE ASSESSING FURTHER DAMAGES & CONTROL MEASURES TO AVOID FURTHER ESCALATION OF SAID INCIDENT. 3RD AD WAS INFORMED TO PROVIDE APPROPRIATE AIRCRAFTS FOR AERIAL RECON, RE THIS MATTER. PROGRESS ASOB. 7901 EASTMINCOM (CARAGA) SURIGAO DEL SUR (TSUNAMI) Ref: 4ID, PA Report RN: OPN-0203-504-10 dtd 03 Mar 2010 On 28 Feb 2010, PHILVOCS issued Tsunami warning number 1 that caused the mass evacuation of people living in the following coastal towns: Lianga area: Brgy Payasan MOL 150 families evacuated at vicinity Km 4, Brgy Payasan and Brgy San Pedro; Brgy Diatagon - MOL 70 families evacuated at vicinity Diatagon Elem School; Brgy Anibongan - MOL 25 families. Barobo area: Brgy Dapdap - 20 families evacuated at vicinity Barobo National High School; Brgy Rizal - MOL 30 families evacuated at vicinity Barobo National High School. Bislig area: MOL 50 families were evacuated at Surigao del Sur provincial Capitol. At about 1700H same day, some evacuees returned to their respective home while the others remained at the capitol.

Other Details: THE ARMED CONFRONTATION RESULTED TO TWO (2) KILLED & ONE (1) WOUNDED FROM THE GROUP OF MANDO. MOTIVE – RIDO / FAMILY FEUD. PROG ASOB.

Summary Report: RE ARM CLASHED AT DATU SAUDI AMPATUAN, MAG ON 090600H MAR 10.On 090600 Mar 2010, RE ARMED CLASHED AT 51N XH 5980768465 SO PINAG-INUMAN, BRGY KITANGO, DATU SAUDI AMPATUAN, MAGUINDANAO.
Civilian Side: Killed Mr Abtilla Abdul, Mrs Noria Abdul, Wounded Mr Bumol Akmad,   Dabay Abdul, Mr Kagi Masingan, Action Taken: a. At about 2020H same day, one (1) squad from Pantar Detachment led by 2LT GERALD FLORES (INF) PA of 68IB with one (1) squad of CAA from Patindeguen PB proceeded to the scene of incident. b. Wounded victims were brought to Libungan Hospital for medical treatment. 8992 EASTMINCOM (ARMM) MAGUINDANAO (KIDNAPPING) Ref: 6ID, PA Report RN: 6DTOC-1803-50-10 dtd 18 Mar 2010 On 16 Mar 2010, a certain Waasom Sajjao Khan, Pakistani National engaging in lending business and temprarily residing at Bulalo, Sultan, Kudarat, Maguindanao was flagged down by more or less eight (8) unidentified armed men oboard red Tamaraw FX at vicinity Brgy Kurintem, Dalican, DOS, Maguindanao while riding his motorcycle. Other Details: Waasem Sajjo Khan was forcibly taken by the perpetrators to an undisclosed area and confiscated his cellular phone, motorcycle and cash amounting to Php25,000.00, Afterwhich, he was turned-over to another group of 16 heavily armed men at a vicinity of Mt Dalican.  After 24 hours of being held in captivity, the victim managed to escape from his captors and seeked refuge to local populace and was accompanied to the residence of a certain Jack, MNLF member of Dalican and later called-up Cotabato City Mayor Muslimen G Sema. Action Taken: On 172230 Mar 10, Hon Mayor Muslimen G Sema sought security assistance from TG Tugis led by LTC DARIO C BUCAWIT INF (GSC) PA and members of ABS-CBN Cotabato personnel and proceeded to Poblacion, Dalican, DOS, Maguindanao to fetch the alledged kidnap victim. After a brief coordination and investigation conducted by Dalican PNP personnel, the victim was brought to Cotabato Regional and Medical Center for check-up and subsequently turned-over to his family at Brgy Bulalo, Sultan Kudarat, Maguindanao. 8994 EASTMINCOM (ARMM) MAGUINDANAO (GRENADE THROWING) Ref: 6ID, PA Report RN: 6DTOC-1803-48-10 dtd 18 Mar 2010 On 171930 Mar 2010, a hand grenade was thrown by two (2) unidentified persons and exploded inside the residence of a certain Maimona S Ampatuan, 56 yrs old, Principal of Maguindnao National High School at vicinity Poblacion, Shariff Aguak, Maguindanao. Civilian Side: Wounded   Henrico Ampatuan,   Monera Camsa,   Norhan Abdulraman, Other Details: Three (3)  vehicles with PNs: MDD 730 (Town ace), KCP 247 (Mitsubishi Adventure) and MCT 739 (Mitsubishi Strada) parked inside the residence were also damaged by the said explosion. Action Taken: a. Joint elements of Scout pltn 45IB, PNP Maguindanao and 15th RSMB under LT AGBING PA, INSP DURA, PINS MANG-OY and PSI BUNAGAN responded to the incident while other troops were alerted and monitored their respective AOR. b. The victims were brought to Cotabato City Hospital for medical treatment. 9058 EASTMINCOM (ARMM) MAGUINDANAO  (HARASSMENT) Ref: 6ID, PA Report RN: 6DTOC-2203-57-10 dtd 22 Mar 2010 On 211945 Mar 2010, five (5) 60mm mortar projectiles landed and exploded near the residence of Vice Mayor Bai Geom Kindo of Datu Abdullah Sangki, Maguindanao and Coy Command Post, 46IB at vicinity Poblacion, Ampatuan of same province.  No casualty was reported. Other Details: The suspects are followers of former Mayor Datu Bahnarin Ampatuan of Mamasapano of said province.  Motive of the incident is personal grudge and family feud. Action Taken: Troops in the area were alerted and directed to conduct patrol to preempt similar incident and to counter LEs planned hostilities. 9083 EASTMINCOM (REGION X) BUKIDNON  (ARMED CLASH) Ref: EASTMINCOM Report RN: EMCOC-2303-471-10 dtd 23 Mar 2010 On 221000 Mar 2010, the group of a certain Adiong Cota was attacked by more or less 20 armed men under a certain Aronga Boratong at vicinity Sitio Tinambakan (51N XJ 8764), Brgy Malinao, Kalilangan, Bukidnon.  The group of Cota sustained one (1) fatality (name not reported). Other Details: a.  The group of Baratong operates at said municipality and Wao, Lanao Del Sur. b.  Motive of the incident is land dispute/conflict. Action Taken: Troops of 75IB proceeded to the area to conduct investigation and provide security. 9094 EASTMINCOM (CARAGA) SURIGAO DEL NORTE  (HUMAN TRAFFICKING) Ref: PNP Report RN: SIGNIFICANT INCIDENT REPORT 032410-01 dtd 24 Mar 2010 On 23 Mar 2010, elements of PDEA 13 conducted anti-illegal drug operations at the house of a certain Ricardo Ecleo @ KAYOY at vicinity Surigao City, Surigao Del Norte, which resulted to the apprehension of certain Roberto Dequiño, a candidate for governor of Surigao del Norte on May 2010 elections, Arlinda Ecleo, Glen Sykimte, Jose Cariaga and Jenelyn Noriega.  Confiscated from their possession were one (1) sachet of white crystalline substance, believed to be "shabu", two (2) cellular phones, two (2) digital weighing scales, assorted drug paraphernalias, a Swiss knife, Php 8,990.00 cash and Php 1,000.00 marked money. Action Taken: PDEA 13 coordinated with Surigao City PO for the proper disposition of the case. 9117 EASTMINCOM (ARMM) MAGUINDANAO  (GRENADE THROWING) Ref: 6ID, PA Report RN: 6DTOC-2603-65-10 dtd 26 Mar 2010 On 25 Mar 2010, An unidentified person lobbed a grenade that exploded at the photo studio owned and operated by a certain Klyed Anthony Moran at vicinity Brgy Satan, Shariff Aguak, Maguindanao.  Afterwhich, the suspect fled towards Lower Satan of same municipality. No casualty was reported but there were damages on the studio. 9174 EASTMINCOM (CARAGA) SURIGAO DEL SUR  (ILLEGAL LOGGING) Ref: 4ID, PA Report RN: OPN-2803-696-10 dtd 28 Mar 2010 On 27 Mar 2010, acting on the reported illegal logging activities in the area, troops of HHC and COLT, 58IB under 2LT CADIL (INF) PA, together with DENR personnel confiscated 60 logs (Lawaan), with an estimated volume of 24 cubic meters at vicinity Sitio Puerto, Bislig City, Surigao Del Sur. Other Details: a.  The confiscation of said lumbers was facilitated by Fr Falcon and CENRO Bislig City, who sought assistance from said gov`t unit. b.  The newly unloaded lumbers has a market value of Php 120,000.00. Action Taken: The owner and the confiscated lumbers were placed under the custody of CENRO Maharlika, Bislig City for investigation and proper disposition. 7949 WESTMINCOM (REGION IX) ZAMBOANGA DEL NORTE (SHOOTING) Ref: 1ID, PA Report RN: 1DC-0703-485-2010 dtd 08 Mar 2010 On 081750 Mar 2010, a certain Alex Drapiza Yke Jamandron, 28 yrs old resident of Brgy La Lebertad, Labason Zambo del Norte, while driving his motorcycle Rider 125, color red was shot by unidentified gunman using Cal .45  who was riding one (1) XRM 125, color red, at vic Brgy Kipit Bridge, Brgy Kipit, Labason, ZDN and after which the gunman immediately fled towards Poblacion Labason.  Other Details: a. The victim suffered two (2) GSW at his chest and one (1) at his left face that caused his instantaneous death. The cadaver of the victim and his motorcycle was already brought by his parents at their residence. b. The victim is a member of the shooter Association of Liloy, ZDN and Provincial champion for 2009. c. Base on the initial investigation being conducted by the troops CCoy, 44IB under Cpl Oquiño, personal grudge was the primary motive of the shooting. Action Taken: Ooa 051825H Mar 10, squad from Imelda PB, CCoy, 44IB led by Cpl Oquiño (Inf) PA augmented with PNP of Labason, jumped off PB to conduct pursuit operation. Said troops returned PB at about 1900H same day with no untoward incident happened. 7998 WESTMINCOM (REGION IX) ZAMBOANGA SIBUGAY  (BURNING) Ref: 1ID, PA Report RN: 1DC-1003-505-10 dtd 10 Mar 2010 On 08 Mar 2010, a Kumatsu bulldozer of Zamboanga Sibugay Province Enginneers Officer was burned by unidentified men while being parked at vicinity Sitio Campo Muslim, Brgy Bacalan, Ipil, Zamboanga Sibugay. Intelligence operative of said unit conducted intelligence operations in the area. c.
